name: QuickSports
0:
”Alexa, open quick sports”
”Alexa, start quick sports”
”Alexa, launch quick sports”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: quick sports
des: This Quick Sports Alexa Skill demonstrates quick sports facts to your desire at various intervals. Spanning from pro sports to minor leagues and players, this APL-based skill incorporates visuals which will open your eyes to sports in a novel way: You can see actual sports plays via images, too! No more phone notifications necessary- this is the skill you need. The sports stats and, soon, news, are finally bundled together in one package.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
